reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's style, with one noting its unique fashion-forward shape, and appreciate its quality and color, particularly the beautiful light grey shade.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, So good
items.body: Just received the Green Poncho sweater in the mail today (3/1/2019). My first impression is 5 stars, but will update later if I experience any issues. FIRST: I ordered a LARGE from the seller, CEASIKERY, which works fine for me because I ordered a LARGE poncho sweater from a different brand name called EXLURA, whom I LOVE and they have a legitimate store on Amazon. Both poncho sweaters are designed exactly the same, but just two different brands names. NOTE: both LARGES fit differently. I truly believe the LARGE in the CEASIKERY brand is bigger, soooo technically I should have gotten a MEDIUM. SECOND: when I compare the two poncho sweaters, I can definitely tell that EXLURA uses a higher quality of yarn, better stitching and softer on bare skin, which I've worn multiple times. CEASIKERY, on the other hand, the material looks nice, but not so sure it is made well, and yarn is not as soft - in fact, just a lil' itch on bare skin, but not bad. THIRD: Both poncho sweaters are "Made In China" and state clearly on the tag to "LINE DRY", which means it is not a good idea to throw them in the dryer. However, both poncho sweaters from the two different sellers look nice and fit me as expected, I an not so convinced that the CEASIKERY poncho sweater will hold up in the washer because of the cheaper yarn material and not so perfect stitching. I feel it would be better to hand wash in order to maintain the integrity. FOURTH: The EXLURA Womenâ€™s Open Front Knitted Tassel Cardigan Stripes Slash Hem Loose Poncho Sweater for $35.99 I do recommend for the price because it is made well. The only down side is it comes in ONE multicolor ONLY. Wish it came in more colors, otherwise I would not be purchasing CEASIKERY. The CEASIKERY Women's Tassel Hem Sweater Long Cardigan Knitwer Pullover Poncho Sweater for $31.99 I would recommend with a warning that it looks nice, but quality is not has high. The only reason why I bought this brand is because they offer more color options. FIFTH: As I mentioned earlier, I bought the LARGE in Green from CEASIKERY, which looks nice, fit is bigger - but still works, however I think a MEDIUM would have fit perfectly. The sleeves go down to my wrist, poncho long enough to cover my bum, neck line drapes nicely, and loose enough that it could drape slight off my left shoulder when wearing a tank or very thin undershirt - which is kinda sexy/nice. For reference here are my measurements: Height 5'6", Weight 150 lbs, Bust 37D, Waistline 30", Hip 41", my build leans more towards athletic than fluffy. Hope this feedback is insightful and provides the answers you seek in making the right fit for you. Thank you. Read more
items.author: Tonya M Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality yarn and quality craftsmanship
items.body: Super cute! I'm 5'9, 135 and the small is perfect. Yarn is soft, fit is perfect, style is great! This is a lightweight sweater, perfect for a 60-70 degree day. I chose mine for transitional mid-spring or early fall weather and I layer it over a camisole. If you wear it in cooler weather, you would need to layer it over a warm, long sleeved layer. Color is exactly as advertised on-line. The ONLY con is that because it is long and tassled in the front, the tassles tend to get caught between my legs when I'm walking!!!! Easy fix though, as long as I am mindful, I either casually hold it when I'm walking or I tuck the longer tail into my belt, or I just walk slower. I would definitely recommend this sweater. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Snug fitting and not super soft
items.body: I think I should have sized up as the arms are pretty snug. Itâ€™s knit but not a soft knit. I canâ€™t say itâ€™s warm but itâ€™s pretty. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great
items.body: True to size and a different look than usual sweaters. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Was Disappointed
items.body: Loved how it looked in the picture but not on me, I felt as though I was wearing a blanket. Maybe I should have sized down? I ended up returning it. The positives is that the package arrived on time, the garment was of good quality and the color was nice. Read more
items.author: MR

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sweater weather gone wrong ðŸ˜•
items.body: If I could give it a negative star I would. The material is extremely itchy and stiff. The way the sweater falls on my body is awkward. No real movement despite the thin material. I would not recommend this item...especially if you have sensitive skin. I have to now figure out how to return it. Read more
items.author: Adylia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very versatile and not too hot
items.body: Ought this to wear to a Christmas party for our office. Light weight, made well also. Had many compliments on this also. I love the ga t that this sweater can be worn casually or can be dressed up. Would love to have a few of these in different colors. Perfect weight of sweater for wearing here in. Florida. Material is soft and not itchy like some. Read more
items.author: April Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this
items.body: Incredibly cute and comfortable. Super warm and lightweight Read more
items.author: Natasha

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Red Brown, Light Gray, Dark Gray, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
